::Ramulus::

Ramulus shakes his head. "No, Lunarpine. Hold your fire, thats an order," he 
raises his voice as he says the last sentence, so that everyone there can 
hear him.

Ramulus takes several steps forward. "Very well, Shuko. A five day truce, and 
50 kilos of energon from you, and give us Ramhorn back unharmed. You may 
leave safely then."

He keeps his gun ready, in case the Newcomer wasn't about to uphold his deal. 
Ramulus didn't expect them to give the energon, but as long as the situation 
was solved peacefully without any casualties, it was worth it.
